Description:
Where nature meets the sea.
Capturing spectacular views of Westernport Bay out to the headland of the Peninsula, this stunningly presented home on a beautiful landscaped 3002 square metre allotment delivers coastal living at it's finest. Enjoy magnificent sunsets over Ventnor Beach and Flinders Headland and bask in the tranquility of this serene location, situated moments from the pristine Red Rocks bay beach.
Entering into this stunning property you are greeted with a circular driveway sweeping into the double carport surrounded by natural landscaping and wildlife. Awash with natural light, this exceptional home commands an elevated position which provides the perfect vantage point to enjoy the far-reaching views. Large windows frame the stunning vista in the open-plan living/dining area which flows onto a balcony that captures the sea breeze. The kitchen comes complete with an electric oven, gas cooktop, dishwasher, and walk in pantry. To complete the second level you will find the large master bedroom boasting beautiful bay views with walk in robe, gas log fire in the living zone and extensive decking which captures the magnificent sunsets.
Downstairs comprises of the second living area with direct access to the covered alfresco area with spa, four generous bedrooms with built in robes, another large bedroom or sunroom, two bathrooms, plus a separate toilet and laundry.
The outdoor spaces will continue to impress, with the botanical landscaping, large gazebo perfect for entertaining on the beautiful balmy nights and large shedding hidden toward the back of the property.
Additional features of this already magnificent home include evaporative cooling, under stair storage, stainless steel appliances, gas cooktop, walk in pantry, gas heating, ample room for boat/caravan/jetski storage and minutes' walk to the famous family friendly Red Rocks bay beach.
You will need to inspect this property to take in all it has to offer!
Insights: 12-14 Red Rocks Road, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2019.

Description:
BUILDER'S DISPLAY HOME
Located within an easy 10 minute bike ride to one of Phillip Islands popular north facing swimming beach. This exceptional 2 storey Coldon Home offering premium inclusions throughout is currently being utilized as a display home in the newly developed WhyteSands Estate. Positioned on a corner block of 569m2 approx. with side street access and located directly opposite a family park complete with barbecue facilities.
Upper level: This well-appointed light and bright living area cannot be faulted with an open plan kitchen, family and meals area with a huge deck stretching the entire width of the rear house being partially covered enabling all year round use. All this creating a great entertaining zone that the whole family can enjoy.
This level also includes a guest powder room off the hall leading to the master bedroom with walk in robe, separate ensuite which also has a private deck plus extra built in storage.
Lower level: 3 bedrooms with a central family room that has direct access to the backyard. A family bathroom, large laundry and double garage with internal access. Ample room in the backyard for a pool or shed.
Extra Inclusions: Polished hardwood floors and carpet throughout, split system, remote control garage, quality fixtures and fittings.
Disclaimer - We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable. However, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective purchasers are advised to carry out their own investigations. www.1stre.com.au

ITS ALL ABOUT LOCATION
Here is the ideal apartment perfect as an investment property or it would make the perfect holiday property with no maintenance to do. With a fantastic location in the main street of Cowes with everything at your fingertips that Cowes has to offer. Complete with 2 bedrooms, central bathroom, spacious living area and the property comes fully furnished ready to go. The property is also set behind security gates with its own intercom giving you peace of mind.

Description:
A New Lifestyle Awaits You!
From the moment you drive in the circular driveway you will be impressed by the street presence of this stunning Lifestyle Property.
Situated at the end of an Exclusive Cul De Sac, on 1 Acre approx of manicured surrounds, this sprawling 34 Square family home offers two massive living zones, a centrally located games room/third living, four generous bedrooms,two bathrooms, with the master suite having a WIR and sizeable ensuite, along with a separate powder room.
Boasting a host of wonderful features that include quality fixtures and fittings, tiled floors throughout, 10 ft ceilings, split system H/C, combustion heating that is the centrepiece of the home and undercover verandahs to three sides of the residence. The kitchen is complimented by an island bench with timber bench top, and stone to the remaining ones, stainless steel appliances, including double oven, induction cooktop and ample storage.
There will be plenty of room to accommodate a Car/Boat/Caravan/Trailer with a huge 14mx11m garage with high clearance and direct access to the home, along with plenty of area for extra cars etc. Adjacent to the property is reserve land with a dam that the current owners maintain.
Enviously located within walking distance of supermarkets, RSL, doctors, shops, cafes and north facing Cowes Beach, Inspections are by appointment only and will surely impress.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

50m²

Description:
Location, lifestyle & livability
This impressive property is set on a huge 1692m2 allotment (approx.) in the centre of Cowes and will astound with all of its inclusions. The home spans a spacious 30squares (approx.) over three levels. The large outdoor, enclosed entertainment patio is an entertainers dream and includes BBQ, kettle BBQ, teppanyaki plate, wood fired pizza oven and double hot/cold sink. Additionally, there are three garages/workshop a tradesman dream space also perfect for the storage of boats/caravans plus a garden tool shed, raised vegetable garden, established fruit trees and electronic entry gates and back to base security system. This property offers the opportunity for personal resort style living. Surround yourself with luxurious facilities while only being a leisurely stroll to Cowes shopping/restaurants and foreshore beaches.
Treat yourself to the best of everything!

Description:
Location, Location, Location!
Whether you are an investor, wanting to purchase a holiday home or looking for a new permanent residence, this property is sure to appeal to a wide range of buyers. Located at the end of a quiet cul de sac right in the heart of Cowes this stunning double storey sandstone townhouse is certainly worth a look.
The ground level of this home comprises a spacious separate formal living zone leading to an open plan second living with kitchen and dining area. The kitchen is complimented by electric cooktop, oven and dishwasher. Glass sliding doors open to a small private low maintenance courtyard. A separate laundry with direct backyard access and downstairs toilet complete this level.
Upstairs, comprises 3 generous bedrooms all with carpet and built in robes and a sizeable main bathroom with bath and separate shower. The master boasts a full ensuite and walk in robe.
Other great features include; polished timber floors, high ceilings throughout, ducted evaporative cooling upstairs along with split system heating/cooling downstairs and double garage with direct access to dwelling.
All set within a 238m2 approx. allotment with lovely, low maintenance landscape surrounds this property is an easy stroll to the primary school, supermarkets, restaurants, doctors, and RSL. Investors take note this property has a successful rental history with no body corporate. This maintenance free home will appeal to families, retirees and investors alike.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.
Insights: 3/1-3 Morgan Street, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2019 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
Immaculately presented home in central Cowes!
Entering the property you will be welcomed by an oversized entrance and beautifully tiled downstairs open plan living. There is a study at the front of the home with provisions for an internal lift to be installed should one desire.
Generous sized downstairs powder room that features stone vanity and quality fittings. Moving though into the open plan kitchen living there is stone benchtops in the kitchen, dishwasher drawer, and full butlers kitchen. There is a gas illusion fire place. There is ample storage, all fittings and fixtures are of the highest quality and a massive 1200 double oven with gas cook top.
Butlers pantry features instantaneous hot water tap system and filtered water, sink and large walk in pantry.
The open plan living area opens out onto the outdoor alfresco area, bifold doors, with complete outdoor kitchen and BBQ cook top featuring a teppanyaki grill. The decking wraps around the rear of the property and features an outdoor shed again with ample storage and an outdoor green house.
Heading up stairs there are four full size bedrooms all with built in robes. The master bedroom is sure to impress! Walk in robe that is to die for and a master ensuite that has to be seen to be believed. Features a double shower, twin vanity all stone bench tops and full sized stand alone bath tub.
There is a second living area upstairs that takes in water glimpses out to Westernport bay.
Property also features a theatre room with top of the line audio system and 6 fully automated cinema chairs with all the functions you'd expect in a gold class cinema. There is a massive four car garage with additional storage in the roof space with pull down ladder access. Double glazed windows throughout the property ensure privacy and peace and quiet. Being an owner builder property no expense has been spared on any aspect of this property, with insulation galore and the highest quality of finishes and fixtures throughout.
Zoned ducted heating and cooling through out the property and a fully intergrated state of the art Sonos sound system that can be controlled with a smart device and also zoned throughout.
This truly is a gem in central Cowes that rarely presents itself for sale.
Inspections are sure to more than just impress!!
Internal area
50m²

Description:
Breathtaking Views Beside the Beach!
Situated in an exclusive pocket of Cowes, only 180 metres from the pristine north facing Cowes bay beach, a rare opportunity awaits on a 388sqm (approx) corner allotment.
You will feel welcomed into this exceptional home featuring light filled rooms, polished timber floors and incredibly large bedrooms. This beautiful home comprises two fantastic levels. The first boasts an enormous master bedroom with walk-in-robe and ensuite, and, open plan kitchen, living and dining space. While the ground level features two large bedrooms with built-in-robes, a second living area, family bathroom with large shower, bath, and a separate toilet.
The open plan living space houses a beautiful kitchen with ceramic bench tops and stainless steel appliances. From the main living area, sliding doors open onto an expansive covered entertainment deck with water glimpses and it's own external staircase entry. Take a few steps up your spiral staircase onto your very own viewing deck with enviable water views that have to be seen to be believed. You'll be ready for the summer or winter with split-system heating and cooling on both levels and ceiling fans a plenty.
Live the true island life with leisurely beach walks leading you to the Anderson Road boat ramp, or even through to the heart of town and the Cowes jetty. Enjoy shopping, restaurants and events in town or simply relax on the north facing bay beach under 200m from your front door.
Other great features of the home include an outdoor shower, privacy and blackout blinds, electric shutters, a two car garage accessible from Sunseeker Court, and a north facing yard.
This property for Sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.
Insights: 17 McRae Avenue, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2019 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
GREAT INVESTMENT OPPORTUNITY
Located just 260m to the beach and 850m to the main street, this property presents itself as a great investment opportunity, holiday home, or permanent home.
The main house consists of 3 bedrooms, a combined bathroom and laundry, and a large open plan kitchen, dining and living area. The kitchen has electric cooking, dishwasher and ample storage. A reverse cycle air conditioner provides year round comfort. The east facing, front deck provides a lovely spot for your morning cuppa, while the large deck at the rear of the property, provides a great entertainment area. Partially covered for protection from the elements, you can enjoy a BBQ, rain, hail or shine. Extending out from the rear deck, there is a bungalow which provides another bedroom, bathroom, plus living area with plenty of space for another bed. Accommodating extended family is a breeze, or use the bungalow to house an older teen.
The large fully fenced yard (approx. 722m2), gives you plenty of room for boat or caravan storage, or even the possibility of subdivision (subject to council approval).
Your private inspection is warmly invited. Don't let this one slip by!
Offers invited.

Description:
Sophistication, Character and Charm
Positioned on a stunning corner allotment in an established yet quiet & pleasant pocket of Cowes is this single level fully renovated cedar clad home in an immaculate condition. With the potential to be sold fully furnished and with all the hard work done the new owner can simply move straight in and immediately enjoy the Island lifestyle right away whether this be for permanent or holiday use.
The residence boasts three bedrooms; two of which have built in robes, spacious laundry, modern and central bathroom finished with stone bench tops and a separate toilet.
The generously sized kitchen, living and dining area flows effortlessly out through sliding doors to the spectacular North facing undercover deck that overlooks the fire pit and the established surrounds - a real entertainers delight and a spot to host many gatherings!
With other great features including polished timber floors, combustion heater, split system heating and cooling, ceiling fan to the entertainment deck, high ceilings, stainless steel dishwasher, 600mm electric cooking and garden shed and the possibility to erect a garage with the large amount of space provided.
All of this is set within a 554sqm approx fully fenced allotment and offering plenty of accommodation and easy drive through access for boats/caravans/trailers.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Make your move!
Located in a central yet quiet and family friendly pocket of Cowes is this immaculate single level home with gorgeous street appeal.
Boasting three spacious robed bedrooms, two bathrooms; the master is complete with walk in robe and ensuite and study that could be converted into a fourth bedroom. The open plan living, kitchen and dining space offers direct access via sliding doors to the North facing alfresco area that overlooks the low maintenance surrounds.
With a host of additional features including split system heating and cooling units, carpet and tiles throughout, stainless steel appliances to the kitchen, LED lighting, double garage and side access for a boat/trailer/caravan.
All of this is set within a 548sqm approx. fully fenced allotment and has been beautifully landscaped by one of the Island's most reputable landscapers.
This residence is within walking distance to the beach, local primary schools and the shops of Cowes. Inspection won't disappoint.
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Immaculate apartment and impressive views
Spend summer days at the beach and evenings on the balcony taking in the beautiful foreshore views from this immaculate apartment.
Forming part of the Bayview Grande complex, this modern apartment features 3 bedrooms (all with built in robes), family bathroom with luxurious corner spa, en-suite and spacious open plan living/dining and kitchen zone with warm timber flooring which extends onto the generous sized front balcony with impressive views over the Bay the ideal location for morning coffee or evening entertaining. As part of the complex, the apartment comes with full access to the indoor pool, sauna and spa, lift access, secure parking and lock up storage space.
Located in the heart of Cowes, this stylish apartment is directly opposite the popular sandy north facing bay beaches and just a short stroll to fantastic cafes, restaurants and bars.
This luxurious apartment would make the perfect holiday or permanent residence and is available with a rental income or vacant possession. Call to arrange your private inspection.

Description:
Right On The Beachfront
The height of island living awaits you. This beautifully presented, fully furnished and incredibly located beach-front apartment will have you situated right in the heart of the Cowes shopping and dining district.
This incredible apartment gives you the freedom to decide how to use your new island getaway. This could be the perfect opportunity for permanent or holiday living, or as an attractive investment opportunity.
Your new apartment comprises a large bedroom/living room and separate fully equipped kitchen/dining area which provides additional lodging for guests, and a family bathroom featuring corner spa-bath and separate shower.
If all of this wasn't enough, enjoy afternoons on your balcony with nothing between you and the north facing bay beach.
Additional features include split system heating/cooling, lift access, a sunny courtyard for owners and guests to use, fully furnished.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Designed For Light And Living!
Claiming a sizeable allotment of approximately 679sqm in the award winning Seagrove Estate, this single level brick veneer home flaunts a sophisticated open plan living area with neutral tones, polished timber floors and plenty of windows to take in the natural light. A covered entertaining area is accessible through the sliding glass doors from the lounge area, offering the perfect environment to relax with friends and family. The centrally located kitchen is complimented with stainless steel appliances and a chic island stone bench top, ensuring a modern and sophisticated quality of life.
The master bedroom positioned to the front of the home include a contemporary ensuite and walk in robe, while two further bedrooms are located off the main living space both with built in robes and central to the family bathroom and separate toilet. The flexible floorpan allows for a fourth bedroom or second living area.
A double remote garage with internal access and an additional rear roller door has access leading out to the expansive back yard. A fantastic blank canvas to create your own oasis!
Additional features include two split system heating and cooling units, laundry with outdoor access, garden shed, concrete driveway, established front garden, storage and side access with room for a boat of caravan, fully fenced.
This property currently has a reliable tenant in place that would be ideal for investors and eventually holiday makers or permanent living!
Please call today to arrange your inspection!
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
PRIME LOCATION
Away from the main street yet only a 10-minute stroll to Cowes main shopping strip, and with the primary school just around the corner. This immaculately presented brick home boasts 3 living zones, 3 bedrooms, master bedroom with a ensuite and walk in robe.
It's all for the largest of families. Upon entering the foyer which has garage access, it then leads you into the lounge area with views to the north facing courtyard and charming garden.
The central kitchen, Hub of the home" is light, bright and modern overlooking the dining area and family relaxation zone. Opening from this area is a games /theatre room with access to the courtyard and rear landscaped gardens. Complete with a shedding and a potting area for the plant lover, plus an additional undercover barbeque area. This property has quality floor coverings, fixtures and fittings throughout and two split systems
Access to the rear garden through garage roller door. This property is secluded and fully fenced.
Perfectly positioned with many more features that would impress the buyer.

Description:
Unique Charm
Situated on a 701m2 (approx.) allotment, this beautiful home boasts more than meets the eye in a quiet family friendly court, moments from the Cowes Bay Beach.
Featuring three bedrooms, one bathroom, a spacious living and dining area boasting high ceilings with exposed beams and a wood fire creating ambiance in this charming coastal beach house.
Outdoors there is plenty of parking at the front and rear of the house, ample room for a caravan, or boat. Additionally, outside features a great entertaining area with BBQ area and bar! Sit back and enjoy the low maintenance lifestyle outdoors with family and friends.
Whilst this home is in great condition to move into, it also leaves great potential to expand into the yard and develop. Located in the heart of Cowes so close to the beach, walking distance to local shops, restaurants and amenities, this house will make the perfect holiday house, permanent home, or investment property.

Description:
It doesn't get better than this!
This beautifully styled home is exceptionally built with a contemporary design. Tucked away in a quiet court, the home embodies both sophisticated living and tranquil relaxation. Proudly positioned across more than quarter of an acre of beautifully landscaped surrounds and offering four bedrooms plus a study, over a well-designed floor plan.
The generous master bedroom features a full ensuite and walk in robe whilst the remaining three bedrooms are serviced by a central bathroom, separate toilet and additional powder room.
The huge open plan living & dining features polished concrete flooring, neutral tones and an abundance of natural light with a cosy wood fire and split system heating and cooling to ensure your comfort in all seasons. The adjoining kitchen boasts quality fittings and fixtures throughout with butlers pantry.
This area opens onto a covered outdoor area adjoining the in ground pool, an ideal space to relax or entertain among the natural surrounds. A formal dining room/second living area and study/home office complete this single level home.
This is a visually stunning home that boasts attention to detail on every level. Only a stroll to the Phillip Island Golf club and the renowned Silverleaves bay beaches, with shops and restaurants just a short distance away. This exquisite lifestyle opportunity would make a luxurious permanent home or excellent investment opportunity, move quickly to secure this outstanding property.

Description:
Earthy Log Cabin Charmer
Set in a quiet location, walking distance to the beach is this fantastic 3 bedroom log cabin residence. With high ceilings, exposed timber beams and timber lining, this home offers earthy character, and loads of charm. The open plan living area, and generous kitchen is the ideal spot for the family to gather.
While the 3 bedrooms (two offering built in robes) a good sized family bathroom with walk in
shower, and a bath, separate toilet and laundry are practically positioned to the rear of the home.
Split system heating and cooling has been installed to provide year round comfort.
Outside, a single carport, open car spaces, water tank and garden shed making the most of this 618sqm approx. allotment. Situated within 5 mins drive of the township of Cowes, this home could suit many potential buyers, including investors, people searching for a great holiday home, or could appeal to those looking for permanent living.
